title: To the Editor: Studies into issues of 'race' and culture in psychiatry carry far reaching social implications and so the methodology used in them, as well as their presentation in journals, should be approached with caution and sensitivity.
abstract: To the Editor: Studies into issues of 'race' and culture in psychiatry carry far reaching social implications and so the methodology used in them, as well as their presentation in journals, should be approached with caution and sensitivity. - Volume 28 Issue 2
